item.description: This class creates a forced movement of type "forced_goto", applies it to itself then die.

field.name: forced_goto_creator.duration
field.description: The total time to reach the target.

field.name: forced_goto_creator.acceleration_time
field.description: The duration of the acceleration and deceleration.

field.name: forced_goto_creator.length.x
field.description: The length of the movement on the X-axis.

field.name: forced_goto_creator.length.y
field.description: The length of the movement on the Y-axis.
